meta.title: PromptTax | Investor Presentation 2026
meta.description: Investment opportunity in AI-powered tax preparation software. 30% profit share + full return of principal from Tax Season 2026 performance.

hero.title: Don't Work for the Machine.
hero.subtitle: Transforming a yearly nightmare into a 15-minute task.
hero.description: PromptTax is the first intelligent tax preparation software designed for the modern economy.

slides.title: The $14.4 Billion Opportunity
slides.subtitle: US Tax Season: 90 Days of Predictable, Massive Demand
slides.description: Every working American MUST file taxes between February-April. This creates the most predictable, concentrated demand in consumer finance.

slides.title: February-April: The Revenue Explosion
slides.subtitle: 80% of Annual Tax Software Revenue in Just 12 Weeks
slides.description: Unlike most businesses, tax software sees explosive concentrated demand. TurboTax, H&R Block, and others generate 80% of their annual revenue during this 90-day window.

slides.title: How Americans File Taxes
slides.subtitle: Understanding the $14.4B Tax Preparation Market
slides.description: 45 million Americans use DIY tax software (TurboTax, H&R Block, FreeTaxUSA). Our AI-powered platform targets this $3.2B DIY segment with crypto-specialized features.

slides.title: The Crypto Tax Complexity Crisis
slides.subtitle: Growing Market Need for Specialized Solutions
slides.description: 52 million Americans own crypto. Traditional tax software struggles with K-1s, wash sales, and DeFi. Our AI handles complex crypto returns that TurboTax can't.

problem.title: The Current Reality:
problem.description: Tax season is mandatory for over 150 million filers. Yet, the tools available are stuck in the 90s.

points.title: Dumb Calculators
points.description: Current DIY software acts like a glorified form filler. The user does all the work.

points.title: Time Sink
points.description: Complex cases (Crypto, K-1s) take hours or days to reconcile manually.

points.title: Expensive CPAs
points.description: Professionals are often unaffordable for the average gig-worker or crypto investor.

problem.chartNote: Based on internal beta testing with Crypto/K-1 portfolios

solution.title: Intelligent Filing for the Modern Era
solution.description: PromptTax moves from 'Do It Yourself' to 'Done For You' using advanced AI. From Crypto wallets to K-1 forms, we handle the complexity in minutes.

products.title: Crypto Tax Calculator
products.description: Seamlessly integrates with exchanges to calculate gains/losses instantly. No spreadsheet nightmares.

products.title: K-1 Generator
products.description: Automatically parses complex K-1 partnership forms and inputs data correctly. CPA handoff ready.

products.title: 1040 E-File + Review
products.description: Complete federal/state filing. Optional 'CPA Review' button for human verification before submission.

competition.title: Outsmarting the Competition
competition.description: The market is polarized between cheap, dumb software (DIY) and expensive, slow humans (CPA Firms). PromptTax occupies the 'Sweet Spot': AI Speed + CPA Accuracy.

positioning.label: Legacy Software
positioning.description: Low cost, High effort, Low Intelligence.

positioning.label: Traditional CPAs
positioning.description: High cost, Low effort, High Accuracy.

positioning.label: PromptTax
positioning.description: Medium cost, Zero effort, High Accuracy (AI).

returnsCalculator.title: 30% Profit Share +
returnsCalculator.subtitle: Calculate your projected returns based on our 2026 tax season performance. Simple terms: You get your investment back PLUS 30% of net profits.
returnsCalculator.assumptions: $3.48M revenue, 75% gross margin, 25% operating expenses = $2.61M gross profit, $870K net profit. Profit share pool: $261K (30% of net). Your share is proportional to total investment pool.
returnsCalculator.disclaimer: Projections based on current beta user conversion rates and market analysis. Not a guarantee of returns.

seedRound.title: The Path to $5M Seed Round
seedRound.description: We're targeting Las Olas Ventures and top-tier VCs for our seed round. But first, we need to prove traction during Tax Season 2026.

milestones.title: Prove Product-Market Fit
milestones.description: Target: $100K MRR by end of Tax Season 2026 (April 15)

milestones.title: Demonstrate User Retention
milestones.description: Target: 40%+ repeat usage rate for multi-product customers

milestones.title: Build Strategic Partnerships
milestones.description: Target: 3+ integrations with major crypto exchanges (Coinbase, Binance, Kraken)

seedRound.calloutDescription: With proven traction metrics, we'll be positioned for a $5M seed round at a $25M pre-money valuation. Early investors in this round will see significant equity appreciation.

growth.title: Fueling Growth
growth.subtitle: We have the product. We need the fuel. Our aggressive ad strategy targets high-intent users on Google, TikTok, and Facebook.
growth.calculatorDescription: Adjust the investment slider to see estimated user acquisition and revenue.

exitStrategy.title: Your Investment is Protected
exitStrategy.subtitle: We've designed a 2-phase validation approach to minimize risk and maximize transparency.

phases.title: Testing & Validation (Jan-Feb 2026)
phases.objective: Validate ad performance, optimize conversion rates, and prove unit economics
activities: A/B test ad creatives across Google, TikTok, Facebook
Optimize landing pages and conversion funnels
Test messaging for Crypto, K-1, and 1040 segments
Measure CAC, LTV, and payback period in real conditions
Validate $65 CAC and $145 AOV assumptions

failureTriggers.title: Stop-Loss Triggers (Exit & Return Funds):
triggers: CAC exceeds $100 (53% over target) for 3+ consecutive weeks
Conversion rate below 1.5% after optimization attempts
MRR growth < 10% MoM in both January and February
Unable to acquire 250+ users with $50K test budget

phases.maxBurn: Maximum burn: 35% of total investment pool ($175K if $500K raised)
phases.exitProcess: If stop-loss triggered: Pause all ad spend immediately → Final reconciliation → Return remaining 65%+ to investors within 30 days

phases.title: Scale & Growth (Mar-Apr 2026)
phases.objective: Aggressively scale validated channels to capture peak tax season demand
phases.condition: Only entered if Phase 1 success criteria met
activities: 10x ad budget on validated channels (Google Search priority)
Launch referral program and PR campaigns
Execute strategic partnerships (Coinbase, Binance, Kraken)
Scale customer support and CPA review capacity
Push for $100K MRR target by April 15

protections.title: Dynamic Budget Control
protections.description: Weekly CAC monitoring with automatic 25% budget reduction if CAC > $85

protections.title: Performance Dashboards
protections.description: Real-time investor access to ad spend, CAC, MRR, user count

protections.title: Monthly Check-ins
protections.description: Mandatory investor updates with option to pause scale if targets missed

phases.expectedOutcome: Target: $100K MRR by April 15 → Investor profit share distribution → Position for $5M seed round Q3 2026

items.title: Capped Test Burn
items.description: Maximum 35% used for validation before scale decision

items.title: Automatic Stop-Loss
items.description: Pre-defined triggers pause spending if metrics deteriorate

items.title: Full Transparency
items.description: Weekly performance reports + live dashboard access

items.title: Data-Driven Decisions
items.description: No emotional scaling - only when unit economics validate

milestones.event: Go/No-Go decision based on success criteria
Phase 2 launch (if validated) OR fund return (if failed)
Tax deadline - Peak revenue + profit share calculation

worstCaseScenario.title: Worst-Case Scenario Analysis
worstCaseScenario.scenario: Phase 1 fails all success criteria by end of February
worstCaseScenario.note: You lose maximum 35% of principal if early tests fail. This is significantly better than traditional startup investments where 100% loss is common.

traditional.label: Typical Startup
risks: Often require follow-on rounds to survive

promptTax.label: PromptTax Structure
benefits: Maximum 35% at risk in test phase
